title: Buffs
description: Buffs that apply to the character. The buffs are applied after the calculations of character properties.

character.title: Character
character.description: The buffs that apply to the character itself.

a4.title: Static Electricity Field
a4.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

c2.title: Electromagnetic Field
c2.description: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects: ·Increases DEF by 25%. ·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

skill.title: Icetide Vortex
skill.description: Sharp frost, swift blade. Tap/Press Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents. "So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."

c1.title: Tidal Illusion
c1.description: Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s. Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c5.title: Chivalric Quality
c5.description: Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c1.title: Excellent Blood
c1.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

a1.title: Pounding Surprise
a1.description: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

c2.title: Explosive Frags
c2.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c6.title: Blazing Delight
c6.description: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s. When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

a1.title: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
a1.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

a4.title: Precise Shot
a4.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

c2.title: Bunny Triggered
c2.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c6.title: Wildfire
c6.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c6.title: Intertwined Winds
c6.description: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c2.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.description: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c4.title: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c6.title: Storm of Defiance
c6.description: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
